core:processNote.core:description: For contactless (Visa requirement) we must leave the ICC reader displaying the Transaction Approved message to the customer for a few seconds. Ideally this would overlap with whatever's coming next, e.g. voucher printing, etc. But there are so many possibilities it's difficult to see how to do that. So for now we just have a prompt that times out after a couple of seconds or can be dismissed by the operator. The Remove Card call at the end will clear the ICC reader display. Somewhat untidily, have ended up with approved coming here but the declined equivalent being done in the remove card subprocess itself.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Open drawer now if configured to do so, or if we are giving cashback.

core:action.core:comment: If this is a split tender and we are not set to print combined receipt, print the customer copy voucher now.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: If this is a split receipt tender, split numbers > 1 get the card voucher now and separately regardless of the 'printCombinedReceipt' setting. Split number 1 gets his now unless 'printCombinedReceipt' is set.

core:action.core:comment: We can't suspend in the middle of an ICC transaction. They must remove the card and start again.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Check user authorisation and pre-amount restrictions using a DEFAULT tender.

core:endProcessAction.core:comment: Represents a choice of return to sales or a failure of this process

core:assignAction.core:comment: Tender is already authorised by manual auth. Skip online authorisation and go straight to request input of auth code. Setting manual auth required will make the reader terminate an ICC transaction. Setting AuthorisationError will ensure the auth response code is set to "02" as it would be if unable to go online and referred.

core:action.core:comment: Make stand-in auth code if necessary: that is, for offline authorised ICC transactions for which online auth was never requested.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Now that we allow an exisiting Tender Item to be passed into Get Card Details, we must destroy the old one on Fallback from ICC or FallForward from Contactless otherwise irrelevant properties will be carried through. In an ideal world we might preserve this stuff somewhere, as we would for a normal voided card tender, but realistically it shouldn't happen that often and there isn't an obvious way to do it.

core:action.core:comment: We use this to clear the 'Transaction Approved' message from the ICC Reader.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: Performs an online request if necessary to re-crypt the Miura Track2 data, then discards Encrypted Track2 data.

core:action.core:name: UIWaitAction
core:action.core:comment: It's necessary to delay here for contactless as the cancel call does not wait to take effect. Once the command is cancelled the second remove call will restore the welcome screen.

core:assignAction.core:comment: Set flag that Contactess Online PIN is requested on host authorisation SCA soft decline, to ensure that we don't re-enter CompleteICCTransaction following the PIN capture and the second online authorisation.

core:state.core:comment: Issue change if required. TODO - determine if change is actually needed before starting change process?

core:eventLink.core:comment: This process prints the store copy voucher so we go in here for CNP as well

core:promptState.core:comment: If an image is set against the card type, display it here. The image is displayed over the numeric pad (or part of it anyway) but can be dismissed by clicking it.

core:eventLink.core:comment: TODO This link will never get executed at present, but, if it did...

core:state.core:comment: Print a cancelled voucher as confirmation if fallback allowed at this late stage (ETEC REQ10 MC). Also if FallForward from Contactless.
